articles.title: Study finds drinking with meals cuts risk of type 2 diabetes - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American study followed more than 300,000 people over 10 years. Previous research has suggested that polyphenols - a compound in the skin of grapes - can reduce blood sugar levels.
articles.content:
You shouldn't feel guilty for having a glass of wine every night so long as you drink it with dinner, like the French.
